meanings.definition: A person who eats food enthusiastically and frequently.
meanings.sent1: The nosher at the party enjoyed trying all the different appetizers.
meanings.sent2: I always keep snacks in my bag in case I get hungry, I'm a real nosher.
meanings.sent3: The nosher couldn't resist the temptation of the dessert table.
meanings.sent4: She was a nosher, constantly grazing on snacks throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: The nosher's love for food was evident in the way they savored each bite.

meanings.sent1: After school, I like to have a nosher before dinner to hold me over.
meanings.sent2: The vending machine had a variety of noshers to choose from.
meanings.sent3: He packed a healthy nosher for his mid-morning break.
meanings.sent4: The picnic basket was filled with delicious noshers for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent5: The flight attendant offered a complimentary nosher to the passengers.
